snippet.title: CrossCode Gamescom Trailer
snippet.description:
Visit Steam for Early Access and a FREE DEMO:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/368340/

A retro-inspired 2D Action RPG set in the distant future. CrossCode combines 16-bit SNES-style graphics with butter-smooth physics, a fast-paced combat system, and engaging puzzle mechanics, served with a gripping sci-fi story.

More about CrossCode: http://www.cross-code.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RadicalFishGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RadicalFishGames

Trailer made by MultiMedia AMDG:
http://www.multimediaamdg.com/
